MemberSignature.Value: public string Issuer { get; }
.property instance string Issuer
Public ReadOnly Property Issuer As String
public: property System::String ^ Issuer { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取声明的颁发者。

span.span: Gets the issuer of the claim.

value.span: 一个名称，指声明的颁发者。

span.span: A name that refers to the issuer of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性是来自已知颁发者颁发者名称注册表由维护的列表的名称。The value of the property is a name that is taken from a list of well-known issuers maintained by the issuer name registry. 颁发者名称注册表是派生自的类的实例类。The issuer name registry is an instance of a class that derives from the class. 颁发者名称注册表将验证签名的令牌颁发者; 生成所需的加密材料与关联的助记键的名称 （颁发者名称）例如，X.509 证书。The issuer name registry associates a mnemonic name (the issuer name) with the cryptographic material that is needed to verify signatures of tokens produced by the issuer; for example, an X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: public string OriginalIssuer { get; }
.property instance string OriginalIssuer
Public ReadOnly Property OriginalIssuer As String
public: property System::String ^ OriginalIssuer { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取声明的最初颁发者。

span.span: Gets the original issuer of the claim.

value.span: 引用声明原始颁发者的名称。

span.span: A name that refers to the original issuer of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含最初发出声明的实体的名称。Contains the name of the entity that originally issued the claim. 此属性旨在促进其中声明之前可能需要等待多个颁发者通过它提供的到 RP 应用程序，客户端的方案例如联合身份验证方案。This property is designed to facilitate scenarios where a claim may pass through multiple issuers before it is presented by the client to the RP application; such as federation scenarios. 值属性是来自已知颁发者颁发者名称注册表由维护的列表的名称。The value of the property is a name that is taken from a list of well-known issuers maintained by the issuer name registry. 颁发者名称注册表是派生自的类的实例类。The issuer name registry is an instance of a class that derives from the class. 颁发者名称注册表将验证签名的令牌颁发者; 生成所需的加密材料与关联的助记键的名称 （颁发者名称）例如，X.509 证书。The issuer name registry associates a mnemonic name (the issuer name) with the cryptographic material that is needed to verify signatures of tokens produced by the issuer; for example, an X.509 certificate. 委托和联合身份验证的方案除外属性和属性通常具有相同的值。Except for delegation and federation scenarios, the property and the property will usually have the same value. 如果值的值的不同属性属性，该声明首先由原始颁发者签发，并随后重新由颁发者颁发。If the value of the property differs from the value of the property, the claim was first issued by the original issuer and was subsequently re-issued by the issuer.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> Properties { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> Properties
Public ReadOnly Property Properties As IDictionary(Of String, String)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ Properties { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含与此声明关联的附加属性的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains additional properties associated with this claim.

value.span: 包含与声明关联的附加属性的字典。

span.span: A dictionary that contains additional properties associated with the claim.

value.span: 作为名称-值对表示的属性。

span.span: The properties are represented as name-value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供允许元数据或有关要与之关联的声明的其他信息名称-值对的字典。The property provides a dictionary of name-value pairs that allows metadata or other information about the claim to be associated with it. 对于生成从 SAML 令牌的声明，此字典可能包含由中常量提供的键类。For claims generated from SAML tokens, this dictionary may contain keys given by the constants in the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity Subject { get; }
.property instance class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity Subject
Public ReadOnly Property Subject As ClaimsIdentity
public: property System::Security::Claims::ClaimsIdentity ^ Subject { System::Security::Claims::ClaimsIdentity ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取声明的主题。

span.span: Gets the subject of the claim.
The subject of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者是哪些断言声明的实体。The subject is the entity about which the claim is asserted. 一些典型示例是用户、 应用程序或服务、 设备或计算机。Some typical examples are a user, an application or service, a device, or a computer. 使用者都由，其中包含对其进行描述的声明的集合。The subject is represented by a , which contains a collection of claims that describe it.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToString ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 返回此 对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Returns a string representation of this object.

returns.span: 此 对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: The string representation of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字符串包含的值和属性采用以下格式:。"类型： 值"。The string that is returned contains the values of the and properties in the following format:."Type: Value".

MemberSignature.Value: public string Type { get; }
.property instance string Type
Public ReadOnly Property Type As String
public: property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取声明的声明类型。

span.span: Gets the claim type of the claim.
The claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的语义声明的内容，即，它指出声明是有关。The property provides the semantic content of the claim, that is, it states what the claim is about. 例如，具有声明类型的声明("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname") 表示用户的名字。For example, a claim with a claim type of ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname") represents a user’s first name. 声明类型通常是一个 URI;但是，你并不局限于任何特定的格式之外，它必须是可表示为字符串。The claim type is typically a URI; however, you are not limited to any specific format other than that it must be representable as a string. 仅常规的要求是声明颁发者和声明使用者必须同意有关声明的含义。The only general requirement is that the claim issuer and the claim consumer must agree about the meaning of the claim. 使用通过 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 的已知声明类型的常量都可通过类。Constants for the well-known claim types used by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) are available through the class. 声明值由提供属性。The claim value is provided by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Value { get; }
.property instance string Value
Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取声明的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the claim.
The claim value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明的值被表示仅为一个字符串。The value of a claim is represented only as a string. 对于更复杂的值类型，建议你使用标准的 XML 架构类型来表示值并是序列化和反序列化到和从字符串。For more complex value types, it is recommended that you use standard XML schema types to indicate how the value is meant to be serialized and deserialized to and from a string. 属性提供值的基础语法的类型信息。The property provides the underlying syntactic type information about the value. 属性提供了有关值的语义信息; 也就是说，它提供的值的含义，并告知如何解释它的声明使用者。The property provides the semantic information about the value; that is, it provides the meaning of the value and tells a claim consumer how to interpret it.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ValueType { get; }
.property instance string ValueType
Public ReadOnly Property ValueType As String
public: property System::String ^ ValueType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取声明的值类型。

span.span: Gets the value type of the claim.
The claim value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含标识值的类型信息的字符串。The property contains a string that identifies the type information of the value. 可以使用此属性，以了解值的格式并提供有关如何序列化和反序列化值的信息。This property can be used to understand the format of the value and to provide information about how to serialize and deserialize the value. 如果你的解决方案需要复杂的值类型，建议你使用中的标准 XML 架构类型属性以指示如何属性旨在序列化和反序列化为一个字符串。If your solution requires complex value types, it is recommended that you use standard XML schema types in the property to indicate how the property is meant to be serialized and deserialized from a string.
